goals.active: Inform Tonn's widow that he was killed in action.
goals.complete: I delivered the bad news about Tonn to his widow, Ceera. As a Pact medic, she deals with death every day, but that didn't make Tonn's heroic sacrifice any easier to hear. In her grief, she blamed me for Tonn's death and ran off, straight into a throng of undead. I was able to rescue her, but she remained furious and refused to forgive me. I can only hope that our eventual victory over the dragons will make Ceera see that Tonn's bravery saved countless lives and helped secure Tyria's freedom.
